remarks:
Rearrange restricted existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.) 

---

 Rearrange existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1999.)
statement:
reeanv $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( E. x e. A ph /\ E. y e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
